title: lf duo and team
body:
Sup looking for an ADC to play with in flex and also a team.

Friendly and supportive.  Prefer the same.

Ranked Bronze 1 in solo queue (only played 15 times..)

replies.body: i would like to play too i just added you
I'm interested. I'm Bronze IV, so I guess it's your choice if you want me or not
add zippydazipster, we'll play a few games together :D
